name: Love!
textInChatBox: Happy 18th birthday to you my love!! Yey legal age na sya! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Sana nagustuhan mo itong simple gift ko for you dalling.
replayText: click anywhere, if you want to watch it again.
